import React from 'react' import { Card, CardMedia, CardContent, CardActions, Typography, IconButton, Divider} from '@material-ui/core' import { AddShoppingCart }from '@material-ui/icons' import useStyles from './styles' const CartItem = ({ item }) => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( {/* */} {item.name} ${item.price}
{/* */} ); } export default Cart {/* {item.name} ${item.price} {item.description} */}
